recipes.title: Leveled Up Avocado Toast
recipes.alt: toast with half boiled eggs and avocado spread with pomegranate seeds
recipes.description: Avocado toast but with a little twist and a touch of unique flavor and added protein
instructions: Toast the bread until golden and crispy.
Mash the avocado and spread evenly on the toast.
Slice the soft-boiled eggs in half and place on top.
Sprinkle with pomegranate seeds, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes if desired.
Garnish with cilantro and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Spinach Tomato Quiche
recipes.alt: a cheese, egg and spinach quiche topped with half cut tomatoes
recipes.description: The combination of protein and minerals in a classic recipe made healthy
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs and milk in a bowl, season with salt and pepper.
Spread spinach and half the cheese on the crust.
Pour egg mixture over spinach, top with tomatoes and remaining cheese.
Bake for 35–40 minutes until set and golden. Cool slightly before slicing.

recipes.title: Creamy Coconut Lentil Curry
recipes.alt: coconut and lentil curry in a bowl of white rice
recipes.description: Plant-based and packed with protein and fiber, powered by lentils and nourishing coconut milk
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat. Sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add curry powder and turmeric; cook for 1 minute.
Stir in lentils, coconut milk, and broth. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20–25 minutes until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Cream Cheese and Peach On Toast
recipes.alt: peach slices on brown toast with nuts and cream cheese
recipes.description: Fruity but also cheesy with crusty brown bread and a hearty sweetness
instructions: Toast bread until crispy.
Spread cream cheese evenly over toast.
Top with peach slices and drizzle with honey.
Sprinkle chopped walnuts and serve.

recipes.title: Chickpea Tomato Curry
recipes.alt: chickpea and tomato curry served with rice, cucumber, and dark bread
recipes.description: A protein-packed, plant-based bowl with chickpeas, fresh herbs, and whole grains for lasting energy
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté onion and garlic.
Stir in cumin and paprika; cook for 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and tomatoes. Simmer for 15–20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve with rice or bread.

recipes.title: Zesty Lemon Pancakes
recipes.alt: stack of lemon pancakes topped with fresh lemon slices and syrup
recipes.description: Bright and zesty with whole grains and protein-rich ingredients, these pancakes offer a refreshing, energizing start to your day
instructions: In a bowl, whisk flour, baking powder, and sugar.
In another bowl, mix milk, egg, lemon juice, and zest.
Combine wet and dry ingredients. Stir until smooth.
Cook pancakes on a greased skillet over medium heat until bubbles form and flip.
Serve with lemon slices and maple syrup.

recipes.title: Veggy Grill
recipes.alt: assorted vegetables including bell peppers, broccoli, and eggplant grilling over open flames
recipes.description: A colorful medley of grilled vegetables rich in fiber, antioxidants, and smoky flavor—ideal for a wholesome plant-based meal
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high.
Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Grill vegetables for 6–8 minutes, turning occasionally, until tender and charred.
Serve hot as a main or side dish.

recipes.title: Blackberry Mint Smoothie
recipes.alt: two glasses of pink blackberry smoothie topped with frozen blackberries and mint leaves
recipes.description: A refreshing blend of blackberries and yogurt, rich in antioxidants, fiber, and calcium for a vibrant, immune-boosting snack
instructions: Combine blackberries, yogurt, milk, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and garnish with mint leaves.

recipes.title: Fruit Mosaic Toast
recipes.alt: nine pieces of whole grain toast topped with cream cheese and assorted fresh fruits
recipes.description: A playful and nutrient-rich snack featuring whole grains, fresh fruits, and creamy protein for a balanced burst of energy
instructions: Toast bread until golden.
Spread cream cheese on each slice.
Arrange assorted fruits on top in a mosaic pattern.
Drizzle honey if desired.

recipes.title: Chocolate Fruit Clusters
recipes.alt: chocolate-covered snack bites topped with crushed raspberries, coconut flakes, and granola
recipes.description: Decadent yet nourishing, these antioxidant-rich bites combine dark chocolate, fruit, and seeds for a satisfying, guilt-free treat
instructions: Melt dark chocolate chips in a microwave or double boiler.
Drop spoonfuls of melted chocolate onto parchment paper.
Top with raspberries, coconut flakes, and granola.
Chill until firm before serving.

recipes.title: Tropical Berry Smoothie Bowl
recipes.alt: smoothie bowl topped with strawberries, blueberries, mango, kiwi, pomegranate, coconut, and sesame seeds
recipes.description: A vibrant blend of berries and tropical fruits loaded with antioxidants, vitamin C, and fiber for a refreshing, nutrient-packed snack
ingredients: Toppings: kiwi slices, pomegranate seeds, coconut flakes, sesame seeds
instructions: Blend banana, strawberries, mango, blueberries, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl.
Top with kiwi slices, pomegranate seeds, coconut flakes, and sesame seeds.

recipes.title: Balanced Charcuterie Board
recipes.alt: charcuterie board with blue cheese, cured meats, crackers, dried fruits, nuts, berries, and pretzels
recipes.description: A savory-sweet mix of protein, fiber, and healthy fats from nuts, fruits, and cheeses—perfect for mindful snacking or entertaining
instructions: Arrange cheeses, cured meats, and crackers on a large board.
Add dried fruits, fresh berries, nuts, and pretzels.
Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate briefly before serving.

recipes.title: Mango Strawberry Chia Parfait
recipes.alt: chia pudding parfait layered with yogurt, strawberries, mango, and topped with oats
recipes.description: Creamy chia pudding layered with fresh strawberries, ripe mango, and yogurt, topped with oats for a fiber-rich, refreshing snack.
instructions: Mix chia seeds with almond milk and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight.
In a glass, layer chia pudding, yogurt, mango, and strawberries.
Top with oats and drizzle with honey.

recipes.title: Strawberry Mint Smoothie
recipes.alt: tall glass of blended strawberry smoothie garnished with mint leaves and strawberries
recipes.description: A cooling blend of strawberries and mint for a naturally sweet, vitamin-packed drink perfect for a quick, healthy refreshment.
instructions: Blend strawberries, yogurt, milk, and honey until smooth.
Pour into a glass and garnish with fresh mint leaves.
